basic_info.name: IIIT Kancheepuram Ranking
description: In 2022, NIRF ranked IIIT Kancheepuram B.Tech as 184th out of 300 colleges in India. In 2021, it was ranked 201st out of 300 institutions in India. IIRF ranks IIIT Kancheepuram B.Tech as 44th out of 192 colleges in India in 2022.

basic_info.name: IIIT Kancheepuram Placement
description: The 2023 placements recorded an overall placement rate of 73%. A total of 260 students applied for placements, with 190 employment offers distributed. The highest overall package offered was INR 32 LPA. The average package granted to dual degree students at IIIT Kancheepuram was INR 13.98 LPA. The average package at IIIT Kancheepuram CSE was the highest of all branches, at INR 12.95 LPA. BTech students received the most number of offers, with a total of 100. Some of the top recruiters include Ford Motor Company, Content Group Technologies, Avancer Software Solutions, Amity Future Academy, Urjita Electronics, and many more.

basic_info.name: Check Placements Comparison: IIIT Kancheepuram Vs NIT Trichy Vs IIIT Jabalpur Vs VIT Vellore Vs IIIT Nagpur
IIIT Kancheepuram Campus
description: IIIT Kancheepuram permanent campus is being built on 51.75 acres of land provided by the Tamil Nadu government. IIIT Kancheepuram is close to several educational institutions and well-connected to Chennai. IIIT Kancheepuram is close to the Physical Education University, TN Police Housing Quarters, and Unitech Residential Zone. Until August 2011, IIIT Kancheepuram was housed on the IIT Madras campus. Later, IIIT Kancheepuram relocated to its permanent campus, which is roughly 30 km from Chennai International Airport.

faqs.question: What courses does IIITDM Kancheepuram offer?
faqs.answer: Ans:IIITDM Kancheepuram offers courses in the field of design and manufacturing, oriented engineering education at the undergraduate and postgraduate levels as well as research-oriented programs at the doctoral level.

faqs.question: How is the placement at IIITDM Kancheepuram?
faqs.answer: Ans: During the 2022 placement drive, the highest packages stood at INR 32 LPA. The average package for B.Tech stood at INR 8.80 LPA and the average package for M.Tech stood at INR 8.69 LPA. Some of the top recruiters include  Avancer Software Solutions, Amity Future Academy, Urjita Electronics, etc.Ques. Does IIITDM Kancheepuram offer any extracurriculars?

faqs.question: Which course is best at IIIT Kancheepuram?
faqs.answer: Ans:IIITDM Kancheepuram offers a wide variety of student clubs.Zerone ClubDance ClubDrama ClubEpic ClubIlliteratiElectronics Design Club

faqs.question: Is IIITDM Kancheepuram a good college?
faqs.answer: Ans:IIITDM Kancheepuram is renowned for its flagship course which is BTech. The faculty for the course is world-class. All the students get hands-on experience in their real-life scenarios to solve real-life problems.

faqs.question: When was IIITDM Kancheepuram established?
faqs.answer: Ans:Yes, IIITDM Kancheepuram is a good college as it is approved by UGC and AICTE.AICTE.ounded in 2007. It is one of the most prestigious design colleges in India. The college is good for its academics and they not only prepare the students for their placements but also all-round development. The college is also well equipped with various facilities such as the incubation center and MaDeIT. The professors are well qualified and the placements offered by the college are also great.

faqs.question: Ques.t all facilities are available on the IIITDM Kancheepuram campus?
faqs.answer: Ans.IIITDM Kancheepuram was established in 2007 by the Ministry of Education, Government of India as a center of Excellence for technical education and research. It was established to pursue design and manufacturing-oriented engineering education and research.

faqs.question: Does IIITDM Kancheepuram provide a hostel facility?
faqs.answer: Ans:The campus is well equipped with facilities like a Librara y, ATM, Health center, Hostel, Dining and S, and hopping center. The campus also has various labs such as BiRD,  TLC, and MaDEIT innovation provide vides better learning experience. The mess at the campus, Akshaya offers a wide variety of foods.

faqs.question: Does IIITDM Kancheepuram have its campus?
faqs.answer: Ans:IIITDM has excellent hostel facilities for its students. The hostel provided all the basic amenities to the students. Various cultural activities are conducted at the hostel level to integrate the cultural interests of the people.

Section.name: About IIITDM
Section.description:
Established in 2007, IIIT Kancheepuram is located in Chennai. The permanent campus of IIIT Kancheepuram is being built on 51.75 acres of land granted by the Tamil Nadu government. IIIT Kancheepuram offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs in engineering IT, design, and manufacturing.
BTech is the flagship program offered by IIIT Kancheepuram. Admissions to the BTech program are granted on the basis of JEE Main rank, followed by the counselling process. IIIT Kancheepuram provides 6 specializations in the BTech program. The overall cutoff for JEE-Main is 2605 - 6701 ranking for the general category. Some of the top recruiters include GamesKraft, Zoom, KLA, Mathworks, and many more.
The overall placement rate at IIIT Kancheepuram in 2023 placements was 73%. A total of 260 students applied for placements, with 190 employment offers distributed. The highest overall package offered was INR 32 LPA. The average package granted to dual degree students at IIIT Kancheepuram was INR 13.98 LPA. BTech students received the most number of offers, with a total of 100.

Ques. What courses does IIITDM Kancheepuram offer?
Ans: IIITDM Kancheepuram offers courses in the field of design and manufacturing, oriented engineering education at the undergraduate and postgraduate levels as well as research-oriented programs at the doctoral level.
Ques. How is the placement at IIITDM Kancheepuram?
Ans: During the 2022 placement drive, the highest packages stood at INR 32 LPA. The average package for B.Tech stood at INR 8.80 LPA and the average package for M.Tech stood at INR 8.69 LPA. Some of the top recruiters include Avancer Software Solutions, Amity Future Academy, Urjita Electronics, etc.
Ques. Does IIITDM Kancheepuram offer any extracurriculars?
Ans: IIITDM Kancheepuram offers a wide variety of student clubs.
Ques. Which course is best at IIIT Kancheepuram?
Ans: IIITDM Kancheepuram is renowned for its flagship course which is BTech. The faculty for the course is world-class. All the students get hands-on experience in their real-life scenarios to solve real-life problems.
Ques. Is IIITDM Kancheepuram a good college?
Ans: Yes, IIITDM Kancheepuram is a good college as it is approved by UGC and AICTE.AICTE.ounded in 2007. It is one of the most prestigious design colleges in India. The college is good for its academics and they not only prepare the students for their placements but also all-round development. The college is also well equipped with various facilities such as the incubation center and MaDeIT. The professors are well qualified and the placements offered by the college are also great.
Ques. When was IIITDM Kancheepuram established?
Ans. IIITDM Kancheepuram was established in 2007 by the Ministry of Education, Government of India as a center of Excellence for technical education and research. It was established to pursue design and manufacturing-oriented engineering education and research.
Ques.t all facilities are available on the IIITDM Kancheepuram campus?
Ans: The campus is well equipped with facilities like a Librara y, ATM, Health center, Hostel, Dining and S, and hopping center. The campus also has various labs such as BiRD, TLC, and MaDEIT innovation provide vides better learning experience. The mess at the campus, Akshaya offers a wide variety of foods.
Ques. Does IIITDM Kancheepuram provide a hostel facility?
Ans: IIITDM has excellent hostel facilities for its students. The hostel provided all the basic amenities to the students. Various cultural activities are conducted at the hostel level to integrate the cultural interests of the people.
Ques. Does IIITDM Kancheepuram have its campus?
Ans: Yes, IIITDM Kancheepuram Has its own campus which spreads across the area of 51. 75 acres. It has lush green gardens and also has all the basic amenities for the students available on campus. Such as. ATMs, stores, banks, hostels, etc.
